Text:
FAKE!  (that, or my computer is haunted)

With VLC, I got a "wrong codec - use windows media player" message while the Universal Studios logo played

WMP indicated that the file is not AVI

Not fake. All good. Plays fine.
Thanks TvTeam...you guys rock!!

This is embarassing.
I must have opened a partial download of one of the other torrents by mistake.
Apologies to the uploader.
